original: Na sukhā kāmā eraka;🔽Yo kāme kāmayati,
analyzed: na sukhā kāmā eraka  yaḥ kāme kāmayati
translated: not happiness, Eraka.🔽One who desires pleasures, Eraka,

original: Dukkhaṁ so kāmayati eraka;🔽Yo kāme na kāmayati,
analyzed: dukkham saḥ kāmayati eraka  yaḥ kāme na kāmayati
translated: desires suffering, Eraka.🔽One who does not desire pleasures, Eraka,

analyzed: dukkham saḥ na kāmayati erakā ati
